SELECT u.id as id,u.context as context,u.title as title, u.icon as icon,u.status as status,u.orderId as orderId, u.createDate as createDate,u.summary as summary, u.typeId as typeId,u.linkUrl as linkUrl, u.category as category,u.typeStr as typeStr, u.messageType as messageType, u.pictures as pictures FROM yg_sys_content u WHERE u.category = #{category} AND u.status > 0 AND u.status < 6
ORDER BY u.createDate DESC
SELECT u.id as value,u.typename as text FROM yg_sys_type u WHERE u.isdel is NULL OR u.isdel is FALSE
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM yg_sys_content u WHERE u.category = #{category} AND u.status > 0 AND u.status < 6

select c.id as id, c.category as category, c.context as context, c.createdate as createDate, c.icon as icon, c.linkurl as linkUrl, c.messagetype as messageType, c.orderid as orderId, c.pictures as pictures,c.status as status, c.summary as summary, c.title as title, c.typeid as typeId, c.typestr as typeStr, c.userid as userId,c.applypeople as applypeople,c.applydetail as applydetail from yg_sys_content c where c.id=#{id}
